SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Class ServerSocketImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.net.ServerSocketImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Runnable
public class ServerSocketImpl extends Object implements ServerInterface, Runnable
This class implements the ServerInterface and Runnable interfaces for server-client communication over a socket.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerSocketImpl

      public ServerSocketImpl(Socket socket, ClientDispatcherInterface clientDispatcher, OnClientConnectionLostListener clientConnectionLostListener) throws IOException
      Constructs a ServerSocketImpl instance.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket for communication.
      clientDispatcher - the client dispatcher.
      clientConnectionLostListener - the listener for lost client connections.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the input/output streams.

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the thread execution and continuously listens for incoming client messages. Each received message is dispatched to the client dispatcher for processing. If an exception occurs or the connection is lost, the client connection lost listener is notified.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
